trans-unit.source: Represents the contract generation options available using the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> 時可用的合約產生選項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions> enumeration with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator.Options%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to control the generated contract code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用具有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions> 屬性的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator.Options%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 列舉型別來控制產生的合約程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Generates asynchronous methods for operations in addition to synchronous versions.
trans-unit.target: 除了同步版本，產生作業的非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: Generates an interface that derives from the contract interface and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生從合約介面和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel" /> 衍生的介面。

trans-unit.source: Generates a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] client class that extends <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生延伸 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" />的 用戶端類別。

trans-unit.source: Generates event-based asynchronous methods for operations in addition to synchronous versions.
trans-unit.target: 除了同步版本，還會產生作業的事件架構非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: Causes all types to be marked internal.
trans-unit.target: 造成所有的型別在內部標示。

trans-unit.source: Generates task based asynchronous methods for operations in addition to synchronous versions.
trans-unit.target: 除了同步版本，還會產生作業的工作架構非同步方法。
